Author: PVD
AuthorNotes: This text is obtained via dev console.

Strings.Tooltip_AuxCyUpgradeConsole: A secondary upgrade console to connect a greater number of upgrades to your Cyclops.
Strings.Tooltip_NuclearFabricator: A specialized fabricator for safe handling of radioactive energy sources.
Strings.Tooltip_DepletedCyclopsNuclearModule: Bring to a specialized fabricator for safe extraction of the depleted reactor rod inside.
Strings.Tooltip_CyclopsSpeedModule: Allows the Cyclops engines to go into overdrive, adding greater speeds but at the cost of higher energy consumption rates.
Strings.Tooltip_PowerUpgradeModuleMk2: Additional enhancement to engine efficiency. Silent running, Sonar, and Shield optimized. Does not stack.
Strings.Tooltip_PowerUpgradeModuleMk3: Maximum engine efficiency. Silent running, Sonar, and Shield greatly optimized. Does not stack.
Strings.Tooltip_CyclopsNuclearModule: Recharge your Cyclops using this portable nuclear reactor. Intelligently provides power only when you need it.
Strings.Tooltip_CyclopsSolarCharger: Recharge your Cyclops with the plentiful power of the sun itself.
Strings.Tooltip_CyclopsSolarChargerMk2: Improved solar charging and with integrated batteries to store a little extra power for when you can't see the sun.
Strings.Tooltip_CyclopsThermalChargerMk2: Improved thermal charging and with integrated batteries to store a little extra power for when it get cold.
Strings.Tooltip_CyclopsNuclearModuleRefil: Reload a Depleted Cyclops Nuclear Module with a Reactor Rod.
